title: NBA Finals Predictions
description:
Jalen & Jacoby make their NBA Finals series predictions before Game 1. Draymond Green says no one has ever beaten the Warriors when they’re “whole”. How much truth if there to that? Josh Allen’s pregame routine has Jacoby VERY worried. Also, there’s one import thing Boston needs to stop if they want to beat the Warriors, AND Jaylen Brown is signing with Kanye West’s sports marketing firm. What does that mean for the future of the industry? All that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
